mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_user (seq, id, pw, email, tel, address, rgstr_date, updt_date) VALUES ((SELECT COALESCE(max(seq),0)+1 AS seq FROM tb_user), #{id}, #{pw}, #{email}, #{tel}, #{address}, now(), now() )
mapper.select: select * from tb_user order by rgstr_date desc
mapper.update: update tb_user set id = #{id}, pw = #{pw}, tel = #{tel}, email = #{email}, address = #{address}, updt_date =now() where seq = #{seq}
